sn55.9:1.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.9:2.1: “Asoko, ānanda, bhikkhu kālaṅkato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi …pe…
sn55.9:3.1: Ayaṃ kho so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.9:3.2: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.9:3.3: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
